name: Priya
greetingText: I know its been a while since we talked!
wishText: May you have the happiest bday ever, ya, even better than last time! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: I know i wasn't there, but doesn't mean I ever left!
replayText: Now click, if you want to watch it again.
